name: Audit Logging
description: Comprehensive audit trail of data changes and assistant decisions with printable audit reports.

prd.problemStatement: Compliance, debugging, and security require detailed audit trails of all system changes and decisions. Printable audits support regulatory requirements.
userStories: As a compliance officer, I want audit logs so that I can verify system integrity
As an admin, I want printable audits so that I can meet regulatory requirements
